channel.title: Forget about Freeman end crash
channel.description: I get to the end of this level after dealing with the tank, aliens, soldiers & robot sentries and press the green door button to got to the next level and CRASH. Unfortunatly Black Mesa has encountered a problem and has to close. I can't get past this point. Has anyone got any suggestions???????? :'(

item.title: Forget about Freeman end crash
item.dc:creator: gregjenk
item.description:
I get to the end of this level after dealing with the tank, aliens, soldiers & robot sentries and press the green door button to got to the next level and CRASH. Unfortunatly Black Mesa has encountered a problem and has to close. I can’t get past this point. Has anyone got any suggestions??? :’(
